name: GitHub Code Implementation
description: Implement code changes in a repository: create branches, write code, commit, push, and open pull requests. Does not merge.

inputs.description: Mission brief specifying what to implement.

outputs.description: Pull request opened with the implementation.
Completion signal filed after PR is open.

permissions.justification: Must read repository content and push code to feature branches. Cannot merge or modify protected branches.

constraints: Must not push to main, master, or any protected branch.
Must not modify policy/, CODEOWNERS, or SECURITY.md files.
All commits must be signed or traceable to the agent identity.
PR description must reference the originating mission brief.
